price: 12 Je suis ton Seigneur. Retire tes sandales, car tu te trouves dans la vallée sainte de Touwâ.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innī anā rabbuka fa-ikh'laʿ naʿlayka innaka bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
